BI GAL WHO NEEDS LESSIONS!!!

hi I'm a newly bi gal who needs lessons on women if any1 can hlp i'd be grateful

I want this guy.

Im the guy who will text you every single morning and tell you good morning and every single night to tell you sweet dreams.

Im the guy who will hold you when you're crying and wipe away your tears.

Im the guy who still thinks you're beautiful wearing sweats and a big t-shirt.

Im the guy who won't pressure you to do things you dont want to.

Im the guy who will show up at your house with soup and a movie when you aren't feeling well.

Im the guy who kisses you on the forehead.

I'm the guy who'll randomly tickle you just to hear your laugh.

Im the guy who doesn't kiss and tell.

Im the guy who actually listens to you when you talk.

Im the guy who's excited all day because im looking forward to our date that night.

Im the guy who is content to just be able to hold you in my arms and wants nothing more.

I'm the guy who can't help but smile when you walk into the room.

I'm the guy who'll say i love you first not because I want something from you but because it's the way I feel.

Im the guy who's perfectly content with staying in and watching movies and cuddling.

Im the guy ho cares more for love than 'sex'

Im the guy who won't lie to you about where he's going or where he's been or who he's been with.

Im the guy who gets butterflies when he hears your name.

I'm the guy who's not afraid to tell his friends he loves you because I truly do!

Im the guy who doesnt mess with other girls when i have you

Im the guy who doesn't care about your imperfections and loves you more for them.

I'm the guy who will hold you while we watch the sunset.

I'M THE GUY WHO REALLY WANTS TO MAKE YOU THE HAPPIEST GIRL IN THE WORLD.

Girls if this is sweet repost this with the title "I want this guy"

have you ever noticed?

Have you noticed the way that people smile at you when they think that you are not looking? Or even when they are saying things about you behind your back even when its nice things?
I have its funny to think that people are so unobservant and that they cant even notice the one person who can honestly say I love you without wanting something in return. They mistake sex as love and dont realise that it isnt its a physical thing not and emotional or mental love just physical. It winds me up something cronic that nobody ever notices when someone is there for them all the time even when they have done something stupid and irrisponsible.
Have you ever noticed that the person that you trust and respect the most always throws that trust and respect back into your face, or that just me?
If you have ever noticed things like this welcome to the club and guess what people its a sucky club!!
I could really do with some cheering up and csome comments or a chat.

Hope to hear from you all soon and thanks for listening to my amazingly long rant about a hell of a lot of nothing. All my love Becci xxxx

What is the point?

im now going to have a rant about everything so if you don't want to read this look away now!

I've recently started talking to this guy that I know frommy 6th form and all he ever wants to talk about is sex or cars NOTHING else! I mean I don't mind having a chat about sex with my girlies ut with a guy that I don't like in that way its just plain old emmbaressing. And when I tell him he tells me not to be such a freak and carries on but the thing that I have noticed is that he only does this when other people aren't around. Does anyone else find this wierd?

Also I'm so fed up with people emailing me saying that they want to have sex with me when they don't even know me. Its so annoying. I mean I don't mind a it of flattery but just going straight to the finale is just a little bit too much for me.

For people that don't know me I'm a fairl shy person when it comes to relationships as I've been hurt so many times before and talking about certain stuff is hard for me, and some people don't understand this. Which I find so frustrating.

Another thing that is winding me up at the moment are stupid chain letters theres only so many a person can take. Jokes are ok but chain letters do my head in! The last one that I was sent said that if I didn't repost it in the next ten minutes my mother would die! Who thinks this stuff up. Who in their right mind would want someone to think that their mother was going to die! Whom ever it was needs their head examining. And any way how do people (who are posting them) know if their mother is dead or dying, its just beyond me.

I think that this rant has gone on long enough and please leave your comments or whatever you wish to do.

All my love Rebeckah xx
